entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
